document.full_text: the arab league decided on saturday to seek full u.n. membership for a palestinian state in the gaza strip and the west bank, with east jerusalem as its capital, ignoring opposition from the united states and israel.
document.title: arab league to seek u.n. seat for palestinian state
lines_and_colors: the arab league decided on saturday to seek full u.n. membership for a palestinian state in the gaza strip and the west bank, with east jerusalem as its capital, ignoring opposition from the united states and israel.
